description: A React component for a login page that handles user authentication by submitting login credentials, managing redirection after login, and displaying error messages.

methods.name: Login
methods.description: React functional component rendering a login form that manages user authentication flow, including form submission, token check, and redirection.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles the form submission event, performs login via API, manages errors, and redirects upon success.
